altername_name: Titi & Crosminet dans Une Aventure Infernale
Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers
Silvestre y Piolín y sus Sigilosas Travesuras
name: Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers
overview: Sufferin' succotash! That "bad old puddy tat" Sylvester wants to get his paws that elusive bird. All Tweety wants is to play his pranks on Sylvester and drive that cat crazy! Their wild and furry antics are straight out of the hit Looney Tunes cartoons! The 'toon that plays like a game, Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers brings the voices, animation and backgrounds of the Warner Bros. original TV cartoon series to the Sega Genesis.
